commit.message:
Rewrite ConfigConvergenceChecker to use Apache instead of Jersey client

The effective exception handling for some confiserver APIs may have changed as WebApplicationException leaked out with old Jersey-based implementation.
Connections will now be reused for a short duration.
Don't use private inner class in return type of public methods
